  physical_appearance: The image shows a bedspread. It is rectangular in shape. The bedspread has a white background. It is also embroidered with decorative elements. There are floral patterns that start at the middle of the top of the bedspread
 running through the right side and eventually ending at the bottom of the left side of the bedspread. These floral patterns are red in colour.

  subject_terms_1: coverlets floral patterns household accessories

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Coverlets

  subject_terms_3: Textile art and design

  sgcool_label_text: In the years preceding the Second World War Indian women in Singapore were essentially homemakers and contributed to community work
 arts and crafts. This is a bedspread from the collection of the late Lakshmi Rangasamy Davar; she was a woman pioneer – she was an educationist
 musician and philanthropist.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a bedspread. It is rectangular in shape. The bedspread has a white background. It is also embroidered with decorative elements. There are floral patterns that start at the middle of the top of the bedspread, running through the right side and eventually ending at the bottom of the left side of the bedspread. These floral patterns are red in colour.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: In the years preceding the Second World War Indian women in Singapore were essentially homemakers and contributed to community work, arts and crafts. This is a bedspread from the collection of the late Lakshmi Rangasamy Davar; she was a woman pioneer – she was an educationist, musician and philanthropist.
